content:
From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
What is this Groovy label on all the failing testboard runs? #349 died almost immediately with

19:16:52 *** java.util.NoSuchElementException: key not found: LEM.Lem_pervasives_extra
19:16:52 *** The error(s) above occurred in session "CakeML" (line 13 of "/media/data/jenkins/workspace/testboard/afp/thys/CakeML/ROOT")
19:16:52 Build step 'Execute shell' marked build as failure
19:16:53 ERROR: Failed to evaluate groovy script.

Larry
Screenshot 2020-08-05 at 21.05.48.png
